participant_1.background:
I've been told my steaks are to die for.
I am a very good listener and I can empathize with people well.
i blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
I don't like to talk about my family's professions.
I immerse myself in a good mystery novel to escape from life's stresses.

participant_2.background:
I have a computer that can play rap music loudly so I can dance with my dog.
I have a habit of biting my nails when I'm stressed.
I'd brag to my friends about my massive collection of foreign films.
I am always looking for ways to help others, and my birthday was a time for reflection and hope.
i work for a large company.

I've been told my steaks are to die for
I'd love to try your steaks someday! How about we hang out sometime and I can tell you about my favorite foreign films and you can cook me some steaks?
That sounds great! I'd love to hang out with you. What are you free to do this weekend?
I'm free on Saturday afternoon. Does that work for you?
Sure, that works for me. I'll be sure to make some delicious steaks for you. See you then!
